channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Everything You Can Do From Google Chrome’s Address Bar (Besides Run Searches)
item.description: Chrome’s omnibox is not just for typing out URLs or searching Google. Use it to take notes, write emails, and chat with Gemini.

item.title: 12 Best Bookshelf Speakers (2024): Active, Passive, and Hi-Fi
item.description: Soup up your sound with these active and passive speakers. We have picks for every budget.

item.description: Donald Trump's opposition to “woke” safety standards for artificial intelligence would likely mean the dismantling of regulations that protect America...

item.title: GoPro Hero 13 Black Review: Interchangeable Lenses and Magnetic Mounting
item.description: The company's latest action camera finally adds magnetic mounting and interchangeable lenses, but the processor and sensor haven't changed in years.

item.title: Perplexity is reportedly looking to fundraise at an $8B valuation

item.title: DataCrunch wants to be Europe’s first AI cloud hyperscaler — powered by renewable energy
